label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_006
content:
## 2024-04-08 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 98
- Active: 96
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 16
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 2

### Enrollment By Treatment Arm
- Multimodal: 31
- Standard: 33
- Placebo: 34

### Efficacy By Arm
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.1
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score SD: 1.9
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 38.3
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 11.6
- Multimodal Six MWT (meters) Mean: 303.0
- Multimodal Six MWT (meters) SD: 31.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 24.5
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) SD: 3.7
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.7
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.5
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 4.5
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 2.2

- Standard VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.1
- Standard VAS Pain Score SD: 1.5
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 47.6
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 7.0
- Standard Six MWT (meters) Mean: 275.0
- Standard Six MWT (meters) SD: 36.0
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 20.4
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) SD: 4.3
- Standard Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.3
- Standard Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.1
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 5.8
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.5

- Placebo VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.7
- Placebo VAS Pain Score SD: 1.3
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 45.0
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 6.8
- Placebo Six MWT (meters) Mean: 267.0
- Placebo Six MWT (meters) SD: 51.0
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 20.3
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) SD: 3.1
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.0
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.3
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 6.4
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.8

### Physical Therapy
- Sessions Scheduled: 201
- Sessions Attended: 177
- Attendance Rate (%): 84.3

### Safety Labs
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 14.1
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.0
- WBC (k) Mean: 7.7
- WBC (k) SD: 1.3
- Platelets (k) Mean: 231
- Platelets (k) SD: 42
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) Mean: 0.97
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) SD: 0.16
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) Mean: 101.0
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) SD: 12.0
- ESR (mm/hr) Mean: 24.0
- ESR (mm/hr) SD: 6.0

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-0684, Description: constipation, Grade: 2, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-0695, Description: constipation, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-0637, Description: pruritus, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PM-PD-0645, Description: Rescue medication log incomplete for 1 subject, Severity: minor

### Events
- Blinded interim efficacy data compiled for DSMB
- Pain diary electronic collection rate: 81%
- Rescue medication supply restocked at 29 sites

### Notes
- Week 6: Pain management assessments on track. 98 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
